subject: Physics
misconception_text: Objects in motion must have a force pushing them forward
correction: Objects in motion stay in motion unless acted upon by an external force.

subject: Physics
misconception_text: Heavier objects fall faster because of greater force
correction: Acceleration depends on net force and mass via F=ma.

subject: Physics
misconception_text: Action and reaction forces cancel each other out
correction: Action-reaction forces act on different bodies so motion can still occur.
